abstract: Trying to make good on its new Xfinity brand name, Comcast said Tuesday that it is dramatically ramping up its video on demand, or V.O.D., service by more than quadrupling the number of available movies.
snippet: Trying to make good on its new Xfinity brand name, Comcast said Tuesday that it is dramatically ramping up its video on demand, or V.O.D., service by more than quadrupling the number of available movies.
lead_paragraph: Trying to make good on its new Xfinity brand name, Comcast said Tuesday that it is ramping up its video on demand, or V.O.D., service by more than quadrupling the number of available movies.
